name: Mega Man X8
description:
Mega Man X8 is an action, shooter, adventure and platformer game developed by Capcom Production Studio 1. It was originally released in 2004. Capcom published the game. Mega Man X8 has a Metascore of 68, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Mega Man X8 on PlayStation 2, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.
Eiro Shirahama directed the game. It was scored by Naoto Tanaka, Shinya Okada and Yuko Komiyama.
